events.message: The customer reported a major collision involving their car on the highway, causing significant damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident to initiate the vehicle damage assessment process.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to manage the case and assist the customer promptly.
The customer received an official acknowledgment email confirming the claim has been received and is under review.
Request sent to the customer for the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates for processing.
The customer submitted all required documents, including the police report and multiple repair shop estimates as requested.
The investigation team began their review to verify the accident details and validate the submitted documents.
Investigation completed with confirmation that the collision was covered by the policy terms and documented correctly.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs and associated damages for the vehicle involved in the accident.
The customer responded positively, agreeing to the proposed settlement amount and expressing satisfaction with communication.
The claim was officially approved by management following customer agreement and successful evaluation of damages.
Payment for the settlement amount was issued and transferred to the customer's designated bank account promptly.
The claim was closed after confirmation that the payment was received and the customerâ€™s vehicle repairs were underway.
